ygData.subject: Anyone play PS2 EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and Salutations ladies, I am Rosepetal a lvl 17 elven druid who plays on the Castle Lightwolf server in the new PS2 Evercrack Online Adventures. Does
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and Salutations ladies,

I am Rosepetal a lvl 17 elven druid who plays on the Castle Lightwolf
server in the new PS2 Evercrack Online Adventures. Does anyone here
play this version, and is on the same server as me? I think its great
that we women have a forum for our EQ addiction. I used to play PC
version, but got bored, and pissed off when all my friends had no
life and would level way above me, always causing me to find new
people to group with. I am curretly an Elder of the Arcane Blades
guild. Should anyone here play this game, I would love to meet up
with you in game. I am 27/f(of course)/Canada,BC. So hopefully I am
not alone in this. :)
God bless and God speed,
Rose
